name: Shadow Moses Smackdown
description:
Controls: Arrow Keys to Move, Z to punch, X to kick, C to block, Double tap arrow keys to sprint.

Shadow Moses Smackdown is a mash up of Metal Gear Solid and River City Ransom made for the Polystation Counterfeit Jam 2017. In retrospect, making a Beat 'Em Up from scratch for a game jam was probably not the best idea, but I had a ton of fun making it and I learned a lot.

Music by K-Pone https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/546497
